title.rendered: Take a look inside Clinic Royale offering international patients a hair transplant in Istanbul

content.rendered:
Clinic Royale – Hair Transplant Center

Clinic Royale – Hair Transplant Before/After

Clinic Royale

The clinic specialises in providing hair transplants in Istanbul to customers from around the world

ISTANBUL, SISLI, TüRKIYE, May 31, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — In recent years, there has been a significant increase in the popularity of hair transplants, leading many patients to consider traveling abroad for the procedure.

Turkey, for instance, has become a popular destination for European patients seeking transplant surgery, primarily due to the competitive costs offered by Turkish clinics in comparison to their European counterparts.

The affordability of clinics in Turkey is attributed to the lower cost of living, which allows for more affordable energy, education, and equipment expenses, ultimately resulting in more accessible services.

However, it is essential to consult with your GP and obtain a clean bill of health before deciding if getting a hair transplant in Istanbul is suitable for you. Additionally, it is advisable to thoroughly research potential clinics, ensuring they have positive independent reviews and qualified surgeons.

One notable hair transplant clinic specializing in this procedure is Clinic Royale, an Istanbul-based practice founded by two experienced hair transplant surgeons.

What can you expect from a hair transplant procedure?

When visiting a hair transplant clinic in Turkey, it can be intimidating if you are uncertain about the process. However, your surgeon will provide you with a personalized and detailed understanding of what to anticipate.

Typically, hair transplant procedures commence with a pre-operative consultation, during which you and your surgeon will discuss your desired hairline design and determine the most suitable technique, such as FUE or DHI, based on your specific needs.

Upon your arrival in Turkey for the surgery, you will undergo a final pre-operative check-up with your surgeon to ensure your well-being and readiness for the procedure. Local anesthesia will be administered during the surgery, and your surgeon will extract individual hair follicles from the donor site.

These follicles will then be carefully transplanted into the recipient area, following the agreed-upon hairline design. After the operation, you will be sent back to your hotel to rest and recover.

A post-operative appointment will be scheduled to assess your well-being and ensure there are no complications or undesired outcomes. Your surgeon will provide instructions for post-operative care, including guidance on when it is safe to perform your first hair wash after the transplant and how to maintain cleanliness in the treated area.

Hair growth usually becomes visible after approximately three months, but the final results may take up to 12 months to fully manifest. This timeline can vary based on factors such as your overall health, age, and the rate of natural hair growth.

Are there other types of hair transplants available?

One of the reasons Clinic Royale is popular is due to its comprehensive range of hair transplant services. While hair transplants are commonly associated with the scalp, they can also be performed in other areas.

At Clinic Royale, patients have the option to undergo hair transplants for the mustache, sideburns, eyebrows, and even the beard. These procedures follow a similar approach to traditional head hair transplants but are conducted on a smaller scale. Depending on the case, hair may be taken from different donor locations. For instance, beard transplants can utilize hair from the nape of the neck or beneath the chin, where beard hair tends to be denser and less prone to thinning or balding.

Clinic Royale
Clinic Royale
+90 552 300 34 52
info@clinicroyale.com

Facebook
Instagram
